content: and 7 3 more times work row 8 and 9 buttonhole row you will have 9 10 10 10 12 12 12 raglan increases 116 129 134 135 156 157 160 stitches joining in the round the right side is facing you it is time to join in the round place your beginning of the round marker slip the last 4 stitches on the end of the needle to a cable needle join in the round be careful not to twist hold the 4 stitches on the cable needle behind the first 4 stitches on the needle knit the first stitch on the needle together with the first stitch on the cable knit the 2nd stitch together with the 2nd stitch on the cable needle knit the 3rd stitch on the needle together with the 3rd stitch on the cable knit the 4th stitch together with the 4th stitch on the cable needle you are now joined in the round and have only 4 stitches worked go to round 1 sizes newborn and 3 months only skip to round 3 round 1 knit to 1 stitch before the next marker kfb sm kfb work 4 times knit to the end 8 stitches increased round 2 knit to the end work rounds 1 and 2 0 0 1 2 1 2 3 times total 112 125 138 147 160 169 180 stitches you will have a total of 9 10 11 12 13 14 15 raglan increases round 3 knit to the end work round 3 1 1 2 3 3 4 4 5 times total taiga hilliard designs ©taiga hilliard all rights reserved 2015 this pattern is for personal use only you can print this pattern but cannot distribute by hardcopy or electronically for free or for sale page 2 divide for the sleeves round 4 knit to the sleeve stitches rm slip the 24 26 29 31 34 36 38 sleeve stitches onto a piece of scrap yarn rm knit across the back rm slip the sleeve 24 26 29 31 34 36 38 stitches onto a piece of scrap yarn rm knit to the end 64 73 80 85 92 97 104 stitches note on the next round move your start of round maker to be under either underarm round 5 knit to the end repeat round 5 until the body of the sweater measures 4 ½ 5 5 ½ 6 ½ 7 8 10 inches from the underarm round 6 purl to the end round 7 knit to the end work rounds 6 and 7 2 2 2 3 3 3 3 times total bind off purl wise sleeves note - work each sleeve separately in the round and place a start of round marker 24 26 29 31 34 36 38 stitches leave a 6 tail so you can sew close the hole under each arm short sleeves round 1 knit to the end work round 1 3 3 4 4 4 5 5 times total
